mapper.select:
SELECT /*+ OneIdReportMapper.getDailyReport */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS NO, TB.* FROM (
SELECT AGGR_DATE , PNR_TOTAL , PNR_UCI , PNR_NEW_ONEID , PNR_REUSE_SKYPASS , PNR_REUSE_NON_SKYPASS , PNR_NEW_POTENTIALID , PNR_SKIPPED , NEW_ONEID_TODAY_PNR , NEW_ONEID_PAST_PNR , NEW_ONEID_POTENTIAL_CONV , NEW_ONEID_SKYPASS , NEW_ONEID_TOTAL , NEW_ONEID_AGENT_MOBILE , ONEID_TOTAL , ONEID_ALONE , ONEID_TARGET , ONEID_SOURCE , MERGED_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS , MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS , MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_NON_SKYPASS , MERGED_SKYPASS_REQUEST
SELECT
FROM XXOID_ONEID_AGGREGATE_II
ORDER BY AGGR_DATE ) TB LIMIT ${paging.perPage} OFFSET ${paging.offset}

SELECT /*+ OneIdReportMapper.getCountDailyReport */
COUNT(*) CNT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT
FROM XXOID_ONEID_AGGREGATE_II

SELECT /*+ OneIdReportMapper.getCtiVocReport */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS NO, TB.* FROM (
SELECT
SELECT REQ_DATEV , TOTAL_CNT_LAST_UPD , TOTAL_CNT_CASE_CLOSE , ONEID_CONNECT_SKYPASS_CNT , ONEID_CONNECT_NON_SKYPASS_CNT , ONEID_CONNECT_TOTAL_CNT , ONEID_CONNECT_RATE , ONEID_CTI_SEARCH_TOTAL_RATE , ONEID_CTI_CONNECT_RETURN_RATE , ONEID_SEARCH_SKYPASS_CNT , ONEID_SEARCH_NON_SKYPASS_CNT , ONEID_SEARCH_TOTAL_CNT , ONEID_HIT_TOTAL_RATE , ONEID_HIT_NON_SKYPASS_RATE , ONEID_NON_HIT_CNT , ONEID_MULTI_HIT_CNT , ONEID_OVER_HIT_CNT , CREATION_DATE , LAST_UPDATE_DATE
FROM XXOID_CTI_VOC_INTERFACE_AGGREGATE_II
ORDER BY REQ_DATEV ) TB LIMIT ${paging.perPage} OFFSET ${paging.offset}

SELECT /*+ OneIdReportMapper.getCountCtiVocReport */
COUNT(*) CNT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT
FROM XXOID_CTI_VOC_INTERFACE_AGGREGATE_II

SELECT /*+ ONEIDREPORTMAPPER.GETSAMEPNRREPORT */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS NO, one_id_target_one_id as oneIdTargetOneId, one_id_target_skypass_no as oneIdTargetSkypassNo, one_id_target_eng_fname as oneIdTargetEngFname, one_id_target_eng_lname as oneIdTargetEngLname, one_id_source_skypass_no as oneIdSourceSkypassNo, one_id_source_eng_fname as oneIdSourceEngFname, one_id_source_eng_lname as oneIdSourceEngLname, source_pax_mapping_one_id_no as sourcePaxMappingOneIdNo, source_pax_mapping_pnr_no as sourcePaxMappingPnrNo, source_pax_mapping_uci_id_no as sourcePaxMappingUciIdNo, pax_eng_last_name as paxEngLastName, pax_eng_first_name as paxEngFirstName, birth_datev as birthDatev, mobile as mobile, email as email, board_yn as boardYn, PNR_FQTV as pnrFqtv FROM XXOID_CDP_GLUE_SAME_PNR_ONEID_II WHERE 1 = 1 LIMIT ${paging.perPage} OFFSET ${paging.offset}
mapper.sql: 'Total' AS AGGR_DATE , SUM(PNR_TOTAL) AS PNR_TOTAL , SUM(PNR_UCI) AS PNR_UCI , SUM(PNR_NEW_ONEID) AS PNR_NEW_ONEID , SUM(PNR_REUSE_SKYPASS) AS PNR_REUSE_SKYPASS , SUM(PNR_REUSE_NON_SKYPASS) AS PNR_REUSE_NON_SKYPASS , SUM(PNR_NEW_POTENTIALID) AS PNR_NEW_POTENTIALID , SUM(PNR_SKIPPED) AS PNR_SKIPPED , SUM(NEW_ONEID_TODAY_PNR) AS NEW_ONEID_TODAY_PNR , SUM(NEW_ONEID_PAST_PNR) AS NEW_ONEID_PAST_PNR , SUM(NEW_ONEID_POTENTIAL_CONV) AS NEW_ONEID_POTENTIAL_CONV , SUM(NEW_ONEID_SKYPASS) AS NEW_ONEID_SKYPASS , SUM(NEW_ONEID_TOTAL) AS NEW_ONEID_TOTAL , SUM(NEW_ONEID_AGENT_MOBILE) AS NEW_ONEID_AGENT_MOBILE , SUM(ONEID_TOTAL) AS ONEID_TOTAL , SUM(ONEID_ALONE) AS ONEID_ALONE , SUM(ONEID_TARGET) AS ONEID_TARGET , SUM(ONEID_SOURCE) AS ONEID_SOURCE , SUM(MERGED_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS) AS MERGED_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS , SUM(MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS) AS MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_SKYPASS , SUM(MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_NON_SKYPASS) AS MERGED_NON_SKYPASS_TO_NON_SKYPASS , SUM(MERGED_SKYPASS_REQUEST) AS MERGED_SKYPASS_REQUEST

'Total' AS REQ_DATEV , SUM(TOTAL_CNT_LAST_UPD) AS TOTAL_CNT_LAST_UPD , SUM(TOTAL_CNT_CASE_CLOSE) AS TOTAL_CNT_CASE_CLOSE , SUM(ONEID_CONNECT_SKYPASS_CNT) AS ONEID_CONNECT_SKYPASS_CNT , SUM(ONEID_CONNECT_NON_SKYPASS_CNT) AS ONEID_CONNECT_NON_SKYPASS_CNT , SUM(ONEID_CONNECT_TOTAL_CNT) AS ONEID_CONNECT_TOTAL_CNT , AVG(ONEID_CONNECT_RATE) AS ONEID_CONNECT_RATE , AVG(ONEID_CTI_SEARCH_TOTAL_RATE) AS ONEID_CTI_SEARCH_TOTAL_RATE , AVG(ONEID_CTI_CONNECT_RETURN_RATE) AS ONEID_CTI_CONNECT_RETURN_RATE , SUM(ONEID_SEARCH_SKYPASS_CNT) AS ONEID_SEARCH_SKYPASS_CNT , SUM(ONEID_SEARCH_NON_SKYPASS_CNT) AS ONEID_SEARCH_NON_SKYPASS_CNT , SUM(ONEID_SEARCH_TOTAL_CNT) AS ONEID_SEARCH_TOTAL_CNT , AVG(ONEID_HIT_TOTAL_RATE) AS ONEID_HIT_TOTAL_RATE , AVG(ONEID_HIT_NON_SKYPASS_RATE) AS ONEID_HIT_NON_SKYPASS_RATE , SUM(ONEID_NON_HIT_CNT) AS ONEID_NON_HIT_CNT , SUM(ONEID_MULTI_HIT_CNT) AS ONEID_MULTI_HIT_CNT , SUM(ONEID_OVER_HIT_CNT) AS ONEID_OVER_HIT_CNT

WHERE 1=1
AND REQ_DATEV >= '${search.aggrStartDate}'
AND REQ_DATEV <= '${search.aggrEndDate}'
AND CHANNEL = '${search.channel}'
